alert.note: Alert for Carroll; Jo Daviess; Stephenson (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS QuadCities (Eastern Iowa and Northwestern Illinois - Quad Cities)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 28 at 8:32PM CDT until July 28 at 9:15PM CDT by NWS QuadCities
info.description: The National Weather Service in the Quad Cities has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Jo Daviess County in northwestern Illinois... Carroll County in northwestern Illinois... Stephenson County in northwestern Illinois... Eastern Jackson County in east central Iowa... Northeastern Clinton County in east central Iowa... * Until 915 PM CDT. * At 831 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Scioto Mills to Bellevue State Park, moving southeast at 30 mph. THESE ARE DESTRUCTIVE STORMS! HAZARD...80 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be heavily damaged. Expect considerable damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles. Extensive tree damage and power outages are likely. * Locations impacted include... Freeport, Mount Carroll, Savanna, Lena, Bellevue, Stockton, Lanark, Milledgeville, Preston, Fairhaven, Hanover, Pearl City, Elizabeth, Shannon, Cedarville, Woodbine, Sabula, Chadwick, German Valley and Miles. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...DESTRUCTIVE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...80 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building.
